response.headline: Korean 18-step scalp treatment recommendation at Eco Jardin clinic
response.summary: Natasha recommends getting an 18-step scalp treatment at @ecojardin_official before any hair procedures in Korea. She emphasizes this treatment is essential preparation for hair work in Korea.

extracted_text: Thank you so much for having me again! @ecojardin_official if you're planning on making an appointment for anything in Korea, you must do an 18 step scalp treatment! Thank me later #18stepscalptreatment #ecojardin #scalptreatment #korea #koreanscalptreatment
